Package utilities

Class WordInfo

java.lang.Object
utilities.WordInfo
public class WordInfo extends Object
The WordInfo class manages information about words and their occurrences in different files and lines. It provides methods for adding words, generating formatted output, and storing Word objects.

  • Method Details

    • addWord

      public void addWord(String word, String file, int line)
      Adds a word to the WordInfo object with the specified file and line number. If the word doesn't exist, it creates a new Word object and adds it to the map and list.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to add.
      file - The name of the file.
      line - The line number.

    • outputPF

      public String outputPF()
      Generates and returns the formatted output for the "Print Files" option.
      Returns:
      The formatted output for the "Print Files" option.

    • outputPL

      public String outputPL()
      Generates and returns the formatted output for the "Print Files and Lines" option.
      Returns:
      The formatted output for the "Print Files and Lines" option.

    • outputPO

      public String outputPO()
      Generates and returns the formatted output for the "Print Occurrences" option.
      Returns:
      The formatted output for the "Print Occurrences" option.
